--- Testing vfnmadd231ps (Fused Negative Multiply-Add of Packed Single-Precision Floating-Point Values) ---
[256-bit test]
Input a: 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 5.500000 6.500000 7.500000 8.500000 
Input b: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 5.500000 6.500000 7.500000 
Input c: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 
Result: 0.250000 -1.750000 -5.750000 -11.750000 -19.750000 -29.750000 -41.750000 -55.750000 
Expected: 0.250000 -1.750000 -5.750000 -11.750000 -19.750000 -29.750000 -41.750000 -55.750000 

[128-bit test]
Result: 0.250000 -1.750000 -5.750000 -11.750000 
Expected: 0.250000 -1.750000 -5.750000 -11.750000 

[Special values test]
Special a: 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 0x7FC00000 0x00000000 0x3F800000 0xBF800000 0x40000000 0xC0000000 
Special b: 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x80000000 0x80000000 
Special c: 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 
Special result: 0xFF800000 0x7F800000 0x7FC00000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000 0x3F800000
